items.title: 7-Zip
items.content_html: Version 24.09 published on 2024-11-29. The summary of changes are: Latest release with enhanced performance and stability fixes, including updates for better cross-platform functionality.

items.title: awscli2
items.content_html: Version 2.24.15 published on 2025-02-XX. The summary of changes are: Multiple API changes including Price, EKS, and Bedrock updates. Dependency rollback for PyInstaller. Bugfixes and new features.

items.title: azurecli
items.content_html: Version 2.69.0 published on 2023-02-11. The summary of changes are: The latest release includes performance improvements and bug fixes. Users are encouraged to upgrade for enhanced functionality and reliability. Refer to the release notes for detailed updates.

items.title: bicepcli
items.content_html: Version v0.33.93 published on 2025-01-29. The summary of changes are: Addresses a language server crash, deployment failures with looped resources, and releases the Deployment Pane as a stable feature.

items.title: bruno
items.content_html: Version v1.39.1 published on 2025-02-20. The summary of changes are: This release improves worker thread efficiency for .bru file parsing, updates templates for feature requests and bug reports, and includes minor fixes and enhancements for a smoother user experience.

items.title: clink
items.content_html: Version v1.7.11 published on 2023-02-28. The summary of changes are: Updated clink-diagnostics-output command to include current settings, added error message text for codes, and fixed input hint and scrollbar height issues.

items.title: dbeaver
items.content_html: Version 24.3.5 published on 2025-02-16. The summary of changes are: Latest minor release featuring bug fixes and performance improvements, ensuring stability and enhanced user experience.

items.title: dive
items.content_html: Version v0.12.0 published on 2024-02-02. The summary of changes are: This release adds features for Docker layer-wise vulnerability detection and secure usage in GitLab CI, fixes compatibility issues with Docker 25+, and includes updates to the Go runtime and Snap installation instructions.

items.title: docker-desktop
items.content_html: Version 4.38.0 published on 2025-01-30. The summary of changes are: The latest release includes new features like Bake and multi-node Kubernetes clusters. It also introduces upgrades to tools like containerd and Docker Engine, along with various bug fixes and enhancements.

items.title: Buiild Apps SDK
items.content_html: Version 6.0.428 published on 2024-11-12. The summary of changes are: This is the latest stable release of the .NET 6.0 SDK, enhancing performance and including updated runtimes for building .NET applications.

items.title: Build Apps SDK
items.content_html: Version 8.0.406 published on February 11, 2025. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release of .NET 8.0 SDK includes updates for improved stability and compatibility. This version supports the newest runtimes and languages like C# 12.0, along with various bug fixes.

items.title: drawio
items.content_html: Version 26.0.16 published on 2025-02-24. The summary of changes are: Latest update to the draw.io core. Uses Electron 34.2.0 and includes all changes from previous 26.0.16 builds.

items.title: etlp2pcapng
items.content_html: Version v1.11.0 published on 2023-06-08. The summary of changes are: Handles pktmon captures more gracefully, improving the tool's robustness and handling capability.

items.title: ffmpeg
items.content_html: Version 7.1 published on 2024-09-30. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release from the 7.1 branch, offering updates to libraries and bug fixes for enhanced stability and performance.

items.title: gateway
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.3 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: The Gateway 2024.3.3 is out with minor updates.

items.title: git-win
items.content_html: Version 2.48.1 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: This is the last version to support the i686 ('32-bit') installer, phase out git svn, and includes updates like Tig v2.5.12, cURL v8.12.1, and OpenSSL v3.2.4.

items.title: cli
items.content_html: Version v1.53.0 published on 2025-02-14T15:20:04Z. The summary of changes are: This release adds new commands and features, such as the ability to cancel CI jobs, manage labels, and enhance MR diff options, alongside various documentation fixes.

items.title: gitlab release cli
items.content_html: Version v0.22.0 published on 2025-02-17. The summary of changes are: Release v0.22.0 includes merging branch 'release-0-22-0' into 'master' and various updates contributed by Furkan Ayhan and Timo Furrer.

items.title: gitlab-runner-agent
items.content_html: Version v17.9.0 published on 2025-02-20T03:15:49Z. The summary of changes are: Update CHANGELOG for v17.9.0. See the changelog for detailed changes.

items.title: golang
items.content_html: Version 1.24.0 published on . The summary of changes are: The latest stable Go release includes performance improvements and updates to enhance developer experience. It provides numerous fixes and refinements for compatibility across platforms. See the official release notes for more details.

items.title: golang1.21
items.content_html: Version 1.21.13 published on 2024-08-06. The summary of changes are: Includes fixes to the go command, the covdata command, and the bytes package.

items.title: golang1.22
items.content_html: Version 1.22.12 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: Go 1.22.12 includes security fixes to the crypto/elliptic package, along with bug fixes for the compiler and the go command.

items.title: golang1.23
items.content_html: Version 1.23.6 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: This release includes security fixes to the crypto/elliptic package and bug fixes to the compiler and the go command.

items.title: helm
items.content_html: Version v3.17.1 published on 2025-02-12. The summary of changes are: Helm v3.17.1 is a patch release focused on bug fixes and improvements. Users are encouraged to upgrade for the best experience. The community continues to grow with active contributions.

items.title: inkscape
items.content_html: Version 1.4 published on 2024-10-13. The summary of changes are: Inkscape 1.4 introduces a Filter Gallery, modular grids, improved palette handling, and faster image clipping, alongside numerous enhancements and bug fixes.

items.title: IntelliJ IDEA
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.4 published on 2025-02-27. The summary of changes are: The latest release fixes issues such as incorrect reporting of missing keys in gitlab-ci.yml, unnecessary spaces in copied documentation text, and plugin update detection. Additionally, AWS providers in Terraform are now properly recognized, and several Kafka plugin issues have been resolved.

items.title: jmeter
items.content_html: Version 5.6.3 published on 2024-01-07. The summary of changes are: Latest release with optimizations and bug fixes to enhance performance and usability.

items.title: jq
items.content_html: Version 1.7.1 published on 2023-12-13. The summary of changes are: This release addresses critical security vulnerabilities, improves CLI usability, and resolves several memory management issues, ensuring better performance and stability.

items.title: kubectl
items.content_html: Version 1.32.2 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: This release includes the latest patch updates and fixes for improved stability and performance in Kubernetes.

items.title: make-win
items.content_html: Version 3.81 published on 2006-11-25. The summary of changes are: This release includes enhanced support for incremental builds, better dependency tracking, and improved compatibility for Windows environments.

items.title: maven
items.content_html: Version 3.9.9 published on 2025-02-28. The summary of changes are: Apache Maven 3.9.9 is the latest stable release, recommended for all users. It includes the newest features and critical bug fixes. Ensure optimal compatibility and performance by upgrading to this version.

items.title: miniconda
items.content_html: Version 4.12.0 published on 2023-03-15. The summary of changes are: Miniconda 4.12.0 includes updated dependencies and fixes minor bugs for improved stability. It focuses on lightweight conda usage, ensuring compatibility with the latest conda versions. This release ensures an efficient setup for Python data science workflows.

items.title: node
items.content_html: Version 20.18.3 published on 2025-02-10. The summary of changes are: Latest stable release with performance improvements and bug fixes for broader compatibility.

items.title: node16
items.content_html: Version 16.20.2 published on 2023-08-08. The summary of changes are: This is the latest stable release of Node.js 16, providing long-term support with critical bug fixes and improvements.

items.title: node18
items.content_html: Version 18.20.7 published on 2025-02-20. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release includes critical bug fixes and updates to ensure long-term support and reliability.

items.title: node20
items.content_html: Version 20.18.3 published on 2025-02-10. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release with multiple updates and fixes for improved performance and reliability, ensuring optimal long-term support.

items.title: node22
items.content_html: Version v22.14.0 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: Node.js v22.14.0 introduces minor updates and improvements in performance and stability. This version includes the latest bug fixes and updated dependencies, ensuring enhanced developer experience.

items.title: notepad-plus-plus
items.content_html: Version 8.7.7 published on 2025-02-07. The summary of changes are: Version 8.7.7 fixes the regression in v8.7.6 regarding SCN_MODIFIED notifications for some plugins and introduces the new API NPPM_ADDSCNMODIFIEDFLAGS.

items.title: openshift
items.content_html: Version 4.17.0-okd-scos.0 published on 2024-12-16. The summary of changes are: This latest release includes updated client tools and enhancements, copied from the okd-scos repository. Existing OKD 4.15 clusters are advised to review upgrade notes before proceeding. The release features preconfigured openshift-install binaries for installation.

items.title: oraclejdk11
items.content_html: Version 11.0.26 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: This release introduces IANA time zone data 2024b improvements, updates to security baselines, and new debugging options for java.security.debug, alongside critical bug fixes for various components.

items.title: oraclejdk17
items.content_html: Version 17.0.14 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: Latest release includes IANA Time Zone Database 2024b updates, enhanced security baselines, and fixes for multiple critical issues like string concatenation bugs and ProcessBuilder enhancements.

items.title: oraclejdk21
items.content_html: Version 21.0.6 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: JDK 21.0.6 includes IANA time zone data 2024b with updates for historical data and compatibility improvements. It also contains numerous bug fixes and security updates, addressing vulnerabilities and enhancing stability.

items.title: oraclejdk8
items.content_html: Version 8u441 published on 2025-XX-XX. The summary of changes are: This is the latest GA release of Oracle JDK 8, providing updated fixes and performance improvements.

items.title: powershell
items.content_html: Version 7.5.0 published on 2023-01-23. The summary of changes are: This latest stable release includes .NET SDK updates to 9.0.102, improvements in packaging pipelines, and refined HelpInfoUri. It also ensures consistent AssemblyVersion for servicing releases and adds GitHub Release and NuGet Release pipeline updates.

items.title: putty
items.content_html: Version 0.83 published on 2025-02-08. The summary of changes are: PuTTY 0.83 includes various stability improvements and addresses bug fixes. This release ensures reliable performance while maintaining backward compatibility with previous versions of PuTTY utilities.

items.title: python
items.content_html: Version 3.13.2 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: Python 3.13.2 includes bug fixes and optimizations to enhance performance and reliability. It is the latest stable release in the 3.13 series.

items.title: python3.10
items.content_html: Version 3.10.16 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: This release includes the latest security fixes and improvements, ensuring stability and security for projects relying on Python 3.10.

items.title: python3.11
items.content_html: Version 3.11.11 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: This release includes important security updates and minor bug fixes to ensure stability and reliability for Python 3.11.

items.title: python3.12
items.content_html: Version 3.12.9 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: This latest stable version of Python 3.12 includes numerous bug fixes and optimizations, ensuring better performance and reliability.

items.title: python3.9
items.content_html: Version 3.9.21 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: This is the latest security release for Python 3.9. It includes updates to address vulnerabilities and improve security. No new features have been introduced.

items.title: rider
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.6 published on 2025-02-28. The summary of changes are: Rider 2024.3.6 includes fixes for debugging session issues, macOS freezes related to Metal rendering, and duplicate items in Go to Symbol search results. It also resolves issues with xUnit v3 tests and Qodana hanging during Unreal Engine project analysis.

items.title: screentogif
items.content_html: Version 2.41.1 published on 2024-09-08. The summary of changes are: This release includes updates to Chinese, Turkish, Arabic, and Dutch localizations. It also fixes the Move Left/Right commands, an issue with an extra color button, and a typo in the stop recording message.

items.title: task
items.content_html: Version v3.41.0 published on 2025-01-18. The summary of changes are: Fixed issues with dynamic variables, added TASK_DIR special variable, and improved template handling and task exclusion options.

items.title: terraform
items.content_html: Version 1.11.0 published on 2025-02-27. The summary of changes are: Introduces write-only attributes, S3-native state locking, and JUnit XML support in terraform test command along with various enhancements and fixes.

items.title: vscode
items.content_html: Version 1.97.2 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: The January 2025 Recovery 2 update addresses various issues. For complete release notes, visit Updates on code.visualstudio.com.

items.title: windows-terminal
items.content_html: Version 1.22.10352.0 published on 2023-02-06. The summary of changes are: Windows Terminal 1.22 marks itself as Stable, introducing a rewritten console hosting implementation that supports Sixels, improved performance, and better grapheme cluster handling for emojis and Unicode sequences.

items.title: winmerge
items.content_html: Version 2.16.46 published on 2025-01-27. The summary of changes are: This stable release includes bug fixes for ALT-F4 behavior, improved folder comparison prompts, and plugin display issues. Additional enhancements were made to manual documentation and translation updates for multiple languages. It replaces earlier stable versions as the recommended release for all users.

items.title: wireshark
items.content_html: Version 4.4.5 published on not provided. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release supersedes all previous releases with enhancements and fixes.

items.title: yq
items.content_html: Version 4.45.1 published on 2025-01-12. The summary of changes are: Introduced support to create parent directories when using --split-exp, updated dependencies, and credited contributor rudo-thomas.
